rows.label: tlk43310191_04_msg0001
rows.name:
We loaded this Divine Beast
battleship with rations in
preparation for war with Superbia.

rows.label: tlk43310191_04_msg0002
rows.name:
But now we're using those rations
that were intended to be used for
war to feed the refugees instead.

rows.label: tlk43310191_04_msg0003
rows.name:
We all have to work together to make
it through these trying times.
